2.label: Medium Impact
2.description: Standard models (4GB), suitable for cloud deployment

3.label: High Impact
3.description: Large models (>4GB), require significant compute resources

environmentalImpact.methodology: Simple size-based heuristic: larger models require more compute. See /docs/environmental-methodology.md for details.
environmentalImpact.caveat: This is a rough approximation for comparison only, not a scientific measurement.
